subject: Copa America (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The shock wasn't that Brazil lost to Paraguay in the Copa América, but in how it lost, without scoring a goal, even though the match went to a penalty shootout.
snippet: The shock wasn't that Brazil lost to Paraguay in the Copa América, but in how it lost, without scoring a goal, even though the match went to a penalty shootout.
